text: Martin E. Sullivan (February 9, 1944 â€“ February 25, 2014) was an American museum director. He served as Director of the United States National Portrait Gallery from 2008 to 2012. This gallery is administered by the Smithsonian Institution. Sullivan died of kidney failure. He was aged 70. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:American historians Category:People from New York (state)
title: Martin E. Sullivan
